Name: Space Ball
About the game: Space Ball is a casual adventure game. In this game, you need to control the ball, through the spikes, jump over the magma, collect gold coins along the way, and finally reach the end. Game Control Only need to use the keyboard's move button to control the ball movement. Also supports Xbox controller. Game Features + Up to 10 levels and will continue to increase. + Custom ball ability and decoration. + Collect boxes, the challenge to the fastest time clearance.
